title: Girls, girls, girls (Captioned)
creator_credit: Norman Taurog, Hal B. Wallis and Wallis-Hazen
brief_description: Over a dozen Hollywood leading ladies, including Stella Stevens, star with Elvis Presley in this lighthearted musical about a nightclub singer who runs a fishing boat as a hobby. Songs featured include ‘Return to Sender’, ‘I Don’t Want To’, ‘Because of Love’ and ‘Song of the Shrimp’.
